hero.subtitle1: Join thousands of successful drivers with our expert-led courses tailored for all skill levels.
hero.subtitle2: Flexible, professional training to help you pass your driving test with ease.
hero.servicesInstruction: Explore our comprehensive driving courses designed to meet your needs.

review1.text: Amazing driving school! The instructors are patient and professional.
review1.author: John Doe

review2.text: I passed my driving test on the first try thanks to Drisavo!
review2.author: Sarah Smith

drisavoWorks.title: Drisavo is your trusted partner for professional driving and transportation services.
drisavoWorks.subtitle: Book a driver or schedule a service in 4 easy steps:
drisavoWorks.step1: Sign up and create your profile.
drisavoWorks.step2: Choose the type of service you need.
drisavoWorks.step3: Select a package or custom plan.
drisavoWorks.step4: Confirm your booking and we’ll be on our way!

footer.companyDescription: From Beginner Driver’s Education (BDE) certificates to connecting students with local MTO-certified instructors, Drisavo is evolving into a platform for complete mobility solutions.

instructorPage.heading: Perks & Benefits

benefits.title: Set Your Schedule
benefits.desc: Flexibility to be your own boss and manage your time.

benefits.title: Expand Your Network
benefits.desc: Interact with diverse people from around the globe.

benefits.title: Competitive Pay
benefits.desc: We can match rates from any driving school in Canada.

benefits.title: Manage Your Profile
benefits.desc: Your performance drives your attractiveness to customers. It's all on you!

benefits.title: Community Impact
benefits.desc: Play a key role in promoting road safety and accident reduction.

benefits.title: Continuous Learning
benefits.desc: Opportunities to remain sharp and up-to-date on safety rules and regulations.

instructorPage.documentsIntro: Our MTO Certified In-car Driving Instructors must have the following documents to be uploaded on the mobile app. Follow the steps and upload the required documents!
documents: Valid Ontario Driving Instructor’s License (MTO approved)
Vehicle Ownership; vehicle in good condition with the brake pedal on the passenger side.
Images showing a dual brake pedal for the instructor, front side view of the instructor’s vehicle including the license plate.
